Emmanuel Biau

University of Liverpool

e.biau@liverpool.ac.uk

Interested in working with me?

Which topics would be suitable for a PhD in my group?

If you want to study multisensory perception, speech, brain oscillations and episodic memory - this is a lab for you! These are keywords but I am always happy to discuss about related topics. Please, send me an email to discuss potential topics.

How to apply with me for a PhD at Liverpool?

You could start looking at the Doctoral Training Partnerships at the University of Liverpool. There are different possibilities to get fully-funded PhD studentships. I apply myself to PhD studentship calls to obtain personal scholarships - reach out to me to know more.

Do I have any postdoc position currently available?

Not now - but I am looking for postdocs to apply and come work with me!

Contact me at: e.biau@liverpool.ac.uk

Emmanuel Biau, 2022 - Adapted from Alison Presmanes Hill's , the blogdown package, and the Academic theme for Hugo.
